channel.title: QuantumCraft 1.3.2 Factions Lockette mcMMO Minigames Mobarena and more!
channel.description:
Essentials Factions Lockette mcMMO Minigames Mobarena
This server is survival. PvP is only allowed between factions. Stealing is allowed which is why you should lock your chest. We have a awesome shop so you can get the items you need easily. Admins and moderators are nice and very helpful. 40 slots so invite all your friends. That's all come join us!
